Posts.Content: I too was diagnosed with Ductal Cancer.I thank God that my doctor did not follow the radiologist recommendation,which was to wait 3 months and repeat the mammogram.I had a left mastectomy because the calcifications extended into the nipple.If I had waited 3 months it would have been invasive cancer and I would have required chemo and radiation.
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications in a cluster

Posts.Content: On 3/1/2008 Abrina wrote: I'm thinking about having a breast lift done on my unaffected breast so it matches my affected one more.  That is if I can afford it.  Has any one done this?  Does it cost less having one breast done and than two?  I'm curious.   Thanks,  I had a breast lift on 2-13-08 and it was covered by my insurance company except for my out patient copay.
Posts.Title: breasts lift?
